Displaying an icon in a dialog box using Ext JS

The following example shows how you can specify an icon in an Ext.Msg dialog box using the static Ext.Msg.show() method and specifying the Boolean icon config option.

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.0.7
  • Ext.MessageBox
  • Ext.Msg
  • icon
  • show()
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.MessageBox Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function () {
    Ext.create('Ext.Button', {
        id: 'btn',
        text: 'Click to launch dialog',
        handler: function () {
            Ext.Msg.show({
                title: 'Status title',
                msg: 'I\'m an Ext.Msg dialog with a custom icon.',
                icon: 'customIcon'
            });
        },
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
